segments.text: Sally ? She is a bachelor girl . She is an excellent designer . Many of the company's advertisements are her child trains .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why is she still single ? She must have a face that would stop a clock .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , quite the other way round . She is a knock-out . She devotes much of her time to her career .
segments.speaker: S2
